mapper.select: select classroom from buildlevel_classroom where buildlevel_classroom_id in ( select classroom_last1.buildlevel_classroom from classroom_last1 where classroom_last1.week_start_end_id in ( select week_start_end.week_start_end_id from week_start_end where week_start_end.start <= #{week}and week_start_end.end >= #{week}) and classroom_last1.day_time_id=#{day_time_id} and classroom_last1.build_buildnumber_id=#{build_buildnumber_id} and classroom_last1.buildlevel_classroom in (select buildlevel_classroom_id from buildlevel_classroom where buildlevel=#{buildlevel}))
